comments.author: @Mr_deez-cardboard

comments.text: The game is great ive played it on ps5 turned off motion blur and the one below it and there is some heavy load time between some areas mostly the 1st hub you get into and the revisit to the museum when it transitiona. Sometimes has some lag spikes but it stays for a milisecond is still glitchy has tons of dialogue errors and crashes alot on the snail races even still those are minor problems its still great but unstable in some places idk how it is on other consoles but if you have a ps5 its a good game for it somewhat
comments.author: @marioguy1225

comments.text: The game is one of the greatest experiences I've had in gaming but I'm on Xbox and yes there are bugs for me and major performance issues on the skateboard races but the only negatives are bugs and performance issues the story and gameplay are amazing so these are things that can get fixed soon since it just released so they will be looking at reviews but sometimes when I'm playing my character will get stuck or randomly unable me to move and I do have issues with the load last checkpoint feature but I know these are fixable no reason to refund just yet
